about.description: I am a technologies enthousiast living in the south of France. I started as a functionnal tester, then automated tester and now I am a freelance web developer. Self-taught, I had the chance to work in various sectors such as military and handicap. I love fixing issues and problem solving. Proactive, I love trying new things and vary technologies.
